title: Bloomberg Markets: Lu on Uncertainty, Distrust in White House
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lu on Uncertainty, Distrust in White House
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Chris Lu\u0010Senior Fellow\u0010University of Virginia Miller Center\u0010Former Deputy Secretary of Labor\u0010US Department of Labor\u0010Discussing a breakdown of the October jobs report and his thoughts on the Mueller investigation and what it's like working in the White House during a time like this.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
